thread.title: Lionel Messi's Instagram Post Fuels Ridiculous Speculation That He's Coming To The Premier League
thread.title_full: Lionel Messi's Instagram Post Fuels Ridiculous Speculation That He's Coming To The Premier League

title: Lionel Messi's Instagram Post Fuels Ridiculous Speculation That He's Coming To The Premier League
text:
Lionel Messi's Instagram Post Fuels Ridiculous Speculation That He's Coming To The Premier League Thu Feb 09 2017 11:02:08   11:02:08 GMT+0000 (GMT) Jack Kenmare Jack Kenmare in football 
Social media is a wonderful tool, but sometimes things can get out of hand. Just look at former Arsenal goalkeeper Wojciech Szczesny who's Instagram was updated with several x-rated snaps yesterday. 
Lionel Messi was involved in another perfect example of social media overreacting when the Barcelona forward posted a video of his kid learning English, 
Does it really mean he is on his way to the Premier League? Really? 
Many have jumped to that conclusion after the 29-year-old uploaded a clip of his son watching a television program with English subtitles. A video posted by Leo Messi (@leomessi) on Feb 8, 2017 at 6:11am PST 
Obviously people decided he was going to the Premier League...what more do you expect? 
Messi has been linked with a move to the Premier League in every single transfer window, but we can't imagine it happening anytime soon. 
The five-time Ballon d'Or winner has 16-months remaining on his current contract but Barcelona are eager to tie down the Argentine star to a new and longer deal. Here's a short compilation of Lionel Messi training goals (via: FCBarcelona ) 
Will Messi stay at Barcelona for the rest of his career? Or is this 'subtle hint' on Instagram a sign of things to come? 
Let us know your thoughts. Sponsored Links
